Question
========

What is **no** assumption for a one-factor ANOVA ('One-way ANOVA')? 
Answerlist
----------
* Equal number of individuals per group.
* Observations are independent.
* Dependent variable is normally distributed in each group.
* Homogeneous variances for all groups.


Solution
========

* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
